title: Blood Has Been Spilled (6U91)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard a mount borne by a [Rohan] Man to prevent that Man from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.
Lore:	“They were hemming the Orcs in, preventing them from scattering, and driving them….”
Rarity:	U
